poem:
**Adolescence on the Screen**

The screen flickers,  
a bright tableau of youth—  
an urgent story whispers  
of shadows cast by men.  
Yet beyond its glowing frame,  
a different tale unfolds—  
quiet tremors in an industry  
where change, unseen, untold,  
sweeps lightly through the aisles,  
and only echoes remain.
